name: Prediction Institute
overview:
Prediction Institute is a company that specializes in making novel and complex statistical solutions easy to use and available for a general non-specialist audience.

Prediction Institute’s primary product Prediction Engine (in its second iteration ingeniously called Prediction Engine2) is an online service that enables newspapers and magazines to more correctly deliver the business optimal number of single sale units to each of their sales outlets, boosting profit by allowing a same or increasing sale to be obtained with fewer produced units. In addition the services provides a large degree of business intelligence and insight into the consequence of various business delivery strategies, as well as other benefits.
